infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to find nearby food deals and restaurants.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location to find nearby food deals and restaurants.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload bag images.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos of bags.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: This app needs access to your location to find nearby food deals and restaurants.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: This app needs access to your location to find nearby food deals and restaurants.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you upload bag images.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos of bags.
